body.name: Timeless: A Tropical Authors Novel (Tropical Adventure Series Book 2)
body.description: Tropical Authors Where Adventure meets the Water If you love mysteries, thrillers and suspense featuring boats, planes, diving, and nautical locations, then come see us at Tropical Authors. You'll find all the best-selling authors in the genre under one roof with links to their books and audiobooks wherever they're sold. Collaborative Projects Beginning with Graceless, our authors are collaborating on novels and novellas showcasing their work and promoting the genre. Look for updates on our website.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tropical Authors Where Adventure meets the Water If you love mysteries, thrillers and suspense featuring boats, planes, diving, and nautical locations, then come see us at Tropical Authors. You'll find all the best-selling authors in the genre under one roof with links to their books and audiobooks wherever they're sold. Collaborative Projects Beginning with Graceless, our authors are collaborating on novels and novellas showcasing their work and promoting the genre. Look for updates on our website. Join our crew for... Twice monthly newsletters Promos from our authors Release details Fun and interesting stories New authors added all the time

Timeless - Four Authors... Another Wild Ride Wayne Stinnett Author of the Jesse McDermitt and Charity Styles series. A Veteran of the United States Marine Corps, as is his main character, Jesse McDermitt, Wayne grew up in Melbourne, Florida, and has also lived in the Florida Keys, Bahamas, and Cozumel, Mexico, among other places. John H Cunningham Author of the Buck Reilly Adventure series. John has either lived in or visited the many locations that populate his novels, and he mixes fact with fiction and often includes real people in the cast of characters. He splits his time between New York, Virginia, and Key West. Nick Sullivan Author of The Deep Series. Born in East Tennessee, Nick has spent most of his adult life as an actor in New York City, working in theater, television, film, and audiobooks. An avid scuba diver for many years, his travels to numerous Caribbean islands have inspired The Deep Series. Nicholas Harvey Author of the AJ Bailey Adventure and Nora Sommer Caribbean Suspense series. Nick's life has been anything but ordinary. Race car driver, mountaineer, divemaster, and since 2020 a full-time novelist. Raised in England, Nick now lives next to the ocean in Key Largo.
All proceeds from these projects fund the website, newsletter, and promotion of Tropical Authors. Visit our website for an Endless supply of books from our best-selling authors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Review of “Timeless”
reviews.reviewText: Wow, these guys are amazing with their creative think out of the box minds. What. Heck of a rollicking fast paced and fascinating story! The story begins in 1976 with Woody Rains flying an anthem Vega plane in a tropical storm with no visibility, his plane hijacked by a Mr Calloway who is pointing a gun at him and telling him to land at Little Cayman. The plane is low on fuel and Woody says we have to land on Grand Cayman, we will run out of fuel before we get there. On approach below the cloud ceiling they hit a flock of pelicans and the plane crashes into the sea. Miraculously Woody survives as does Calloway, and they reach shore and Calloway disappears. Switch to 46 years later and Eddie Rains is has landed on Grand Cayman to try and find the wreck of the plane and get some answers to his Father’s death. A letter he found after his mother died was mailed by his father from Little Cayman the day after the plane went down. The story is fascinating and entertaining, and characters we have met in other books appear. Great writing by four great authors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am a fan of Wayne Stinnett and all of his works. When he began collaborating with these other authors, I was thrilled with the result of the first book they wrote. Now this second.... Wow! Fantastic!These authors clearly work well together and wrote each character as their creators did. I was toying with the idea of beginning the other authors' series after I read Graceless. But after reading Timeless, I am no longer toying with the idea and am ready to pick up those books now. As a matter of fact, I have samples of all their firsts already downloaded. I am already looking forward to reading the next book in the tropical adventures to see what new authors I can find.This book was so well written in following Eddie as he searched to discover what happened to his father. I loved the flashbacks to his father and what happened to him. It gave a needed backstory to correlate with the present day search. Love how each main character interacted together too.I could go on and on but I'll just end with: Ahh, well done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: When I see a collaboration between several authors, I think, "This will be terrible."But it isn't. It's almost 5 stars except for the silly plot thread where the good guys hold a sexy party at an abandoned house to lure the bad guy in. Seriously?Otherwise, I liked the characters, especially our hero. The others were a little over the top but squeezing them into a plot line was tight.It was a page turner, and I loved most of it, especially the flying and island life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Entertaining Read
reviews.reviewText: With all the authors involved it was a well put together story, entertaining with each author put his spin on it but keeping the other characters on track! Looking forward to the next installment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a fantastic book!!!
reviews.reviewText: Oh my,my favorite authors did it again. The blending of the various characters, the split timelines made for some exciting reading.When I read a book I hear the voices of the characters and from the description of the islands, the various locations in them I can visualize all that's going on. When I can't, such as what a particular boat or plane looks like, good ole Google comes to my rescue.I read Graceless and will now begin Shameless.. I pre-order as they're still writing. I recommend this book and all the books by these guys, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this book
reviews.reviewText: The four Tropical Authors did an amazing job of bringing their characters together. The story is great, and the flashbacks are above and beyond. This group did a fabulous job with their first installment, and Timeless is even better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Four phenomenal authors raised their own bar with "Timeless"
reviews.reviewText: Gathering the already well established protagonists of this group of Tropical Author's equals a storyline that grips readers from the onset forging a mind-boggling, high-octane goal to find the truth for a son whose father disappeared in 1976. The search, forged from sketchy clues is a rollercoaster ride gathering momentum as volunteers share long hidden information generating paths to follow. It's a great read, yeah!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hold on to your seat, here we go!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the seamless flow of the story (I only knew the author switched after someone else's character showed up) and the action kept me reading long after bedtime. Again I have to say I wish it was longer guys, guess you'll just have to keep writing more. If you've only dipped your toes in the Tropical Authers waters before this is a perfect way to meet their characters and discover new treasures. Good reading!

Whereas the plot was interesting some of the situations the various characters were ridiculous and very predictable. This group of authors can do much better and I suggest they put more effort into any future books they may collaborate on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I think Timeless is a better book than Graceless. The authors seems to have co-operated seamlessly this time. I was very impresses with the way in which each authors' main characters worked so well together to enhance the story. A very worthwhile read, which I would recommend to others.
